What It Measures: Out of all relevant items, how many were found in top-20 recommendations
Example: 20% = Found 2 out of 10 relevant items in top-20

What It Measures: Quality of ranking - considers both relevance and position
What Higher Means: Better at ranking relevant items higher
Example: 7% = Good ranking quality with relevant items near top

What It Measures: Overall assessment based on Recall@20 score
Example: Excellent = Strong performance for recommendation task
